scripts.build:dev: yarn workspace @firebase-monorepo-template/common build && yarn workspace @firebase-monorepo-template/functions build
scripts.build:common: yarn workspace @firebase-monorepo-template/common build && yarn workspace @firebase-monorepo-template/common-test build
scripts.build-functions:dev: npm run config-set:dev --prefix ./functions && npm run build --prefix ./functions
scripts.build-functions:prod: npm run config-set:prod --prefix ./functions && npm run build --prefix ./functions
scripts.test: yarn workspace @firebase-monorepo-template/functions test-emulator && yarn workspace @firebase-monorepo-template/security-rule test-emulator
